Headline: 95th-bound Red and Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red & Loop-bound Brown Line trains running w/residual delays & congestion following earlier delay near Wellington. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red & Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier delay near Wellington. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
